Test Description: Testing basic game understanding and rule understanding.
Question: How many completed features are there in the given landscape before placing any tiles given?
Rationale: Before placing any tiles, there are 5 completed features in the landscape: 1 completed city at (5,1) and (6,1). There are 4 completed roads - from moanastry (at (3,2)) to village (at (4,3)), from village (4,3) to tri-road intersection (at (3,4)), from tri-road intersection (at (3,4)) to village (at (2,4)), and from village (at (2,4)) to city (at (2,3)). All coordinates are taken with respect to the bottom-left corner of the landscape as (1,1). Therefore, there are a total of 5 completed features in the given landscape before placing any tiles.
